attributes.action: Ban lorrys/goods vehicles from overtaking on two-lane motorways or dual carriageways e.g. M26
attributes.additional_details:
Driving in Germany you frequently see "no overtaking" for Light Goods Vehicles and Heavy Goods vehicles.

Travelling frequently on the M26 and you suffer the delays of a lorry overtaking another and it takes forever. If they are all limited to 56mph, how can they possibly proceed in a timely manner. Forcing to stay in lane 1 would allow traffic to progress in a far better way for all.

I am sure its not just the M26 - perhaps all dual carriageways should have this too
